fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: Many nations possesses military might, but almost nobody possesses individual might. A breakthrough is needed.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: Wealth is temporary, but achievement is permanent.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: The entity that prints your money controls your wealth.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: Printing money out of nothing = taking a piece of everyone's money without permission.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: In a big company, it is not your name that is famous, but the company's unless you own it.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: If you want to carve your name in business, build your own or help a small business to grow and own it.

fajar_quotes.author: Fajar Purnama
fajar_quotes.quote: If gun ownership are insurance for the government in becoming too powerful, gold and bitcoin are insurances for the central banks in becoming too powerful.

other_quotes.author: Bruce Lee
other_quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.

other_quotes.author: Sun Tzu
other_quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.

other_quotes.author: Emil Cioran, Romanian philosopher.
other_quotes.quote: It is no nation we inhabit, but a language. Make no mistake; our native tongue is our true fatherland.

other_quotes.author: Bob Sadino
other_quotes.quote: No matter how high your position is you are still an employee, no matter how low your business is you are the boss.

other_quotes.author: Che Guevara
other_quotes.quote: Shoot! You are only going to kill a man.

other_quotes.author: Albert Einstein
other_quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

other_quotes.author: The National Wartime Nutrition Program
other_quotes.quote: Food is a weapon, don't waste it! Buy wisely, cook carefully, eat it all.

other_quotes.author: Anonym
other_quotes.quote: Don't you miss me? I can honestly say that I wake up every morning, get down on my knees and thank God that you are not here.

other_quotes.author: Howard Phillips Lovecraft
other_quotes.quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.

other_quotes.author: Howard Phillips Lovecraft
other_quotes.quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.

other_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
other_quotes.quote: The person who signs your paycheck controls your life. Shouldn't that person be you?

other_quotes.author: Warren Buffet
other_quotes.quote: Be greedy when others are fearful.

other_quotes.author: Andreas Antonopoulos
other_quotes.quote: Your keys, your itcoin. Not your keys, not your bitcoin.

other_quotes.author: General McChrystal
other_quotes.quote: Gun ownership are insurance for the government in becoming too powerful.
